snippet: The British chain, which grossly misjudged American consumer habits, said it would cost $1.8 billion to quit the U.S. market.
abstract: British supermarket chain Tesco, which grossly misjudged American consumer habits, says it will cost 1.2 billion pounds ($1.8 billion) to withdraw from the United States market.
lead_paragraph: The British chain, which grossly misjudged American consumer habits, said it would cost $1.8 billion to quit the U.S. market.

headline.main: Tesco to Pay Dearly to Leave United States
headline.print_headline: Tesco to Sustain Large Costs In Leaving American Market
